name: MINDESCAPE
description:
MINDESCAPE is a short, Top down Stealth game in-which the player attempts to escape through the red doors and avoid the creeping nightmares that wander the forgotten world.

PLOT: 

You play through the bleak and increasingly bizarre Landscapes that plague the artists mind, Avoiding obstacles in what your character has dubbed: "The Nothing". Find The Exit to escape your nightmare with 2 different endings.
